entry.title: MINI Skinny Tumblers w/straw (12oz) - Light Blue
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 10.95

Please note that these are NOT suitable for sublimation printing. They are not coated.

These double-walled stainless steel 12oz tumblers with lid are great for summer parties or wedding party gifts. 

No sweating or condensation and promise to keep your drink hot or cold for hours.

They feature a plastic lid with a straw and a silicone ring to secure it inside the cup. The cup can also be used without a lid. 

*Clear straw is included

Tumblers are manufactured in small batches and you will see differences between colours and finishes between different batches and dye lots, we apologize that this is out of our control. Hand-wash only and do NOT let lids soak, do not pour boiling water over them. Plastic lids will not last as long as stainless steel tumblers and replacement lids are available. Dishwashing the lids will cause hazing and cracking of the lids.

entry.title: 12oz Stainless FLORAL WINE Tumbler - #3- Secret Garden
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 10.95

Please note that these are NOT suitable for sublimation printing. They are not coated.

From our floral numbered collection - these lids have a slide closure lid. 

These double-walled stainless steel 12oz wine tumblers with lids are great for summer parties or wedding party gifts. 

No sweating or condensation and promise to keep your drink hot or cold for hours.

They feature a plastic lid with a small drinking hole with a slider lid closure, a silicone ring to secure it inside the cup. The cup can also be used without a lid. 

This features a non-skid bottom with a wider bottom base. 

**Straw is not included

DISCLAIMER: Tumblers are manufactured in small batches and you will see differences between colours and finishes between different batches and dye lots, we apologize that this is out of our control. Hand-wash only and do NOT let lids soak, do not pour boiling water over them. Plastic lids will not last as long as stainless steel tumblers and replacement lids are available. Dishwashing the lids will cause hazing and cracking of the lids. 

 

** Due to the nature of these cups being wrapped, they do have overlap lines. Please be aware that seams and bottoms will show the overlap wrapping. We have included pictures **

entry.title: 6oz Stainless CHAMPAGNE FLUTE Tumbler - Black Matte (F)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 9.95

Please note that these are NOT suitable for sublimation printing. They are not coated.

These double walled stainless steel 6oz Champagne Flute with lids are great for summer parties or wedding party gifts. 

No sweating or condensation and promise to keep your drink hot or cold for hours.

They feature a plastic lid with a small drinking hole and a silicone ring to secure it inside the cup. The cup can also be used without a lid. 

DISCLAIMER: Tumblers are manufactured in small batches and you will see differences between colours and finishes between different batches and dye lots, we apologize that this is out of our control. Hand-wash only and do NOT let lids soak, do not pour boiling water over them. Plastic lids will not last as long as stainless steel tumblers and replacement lids are available. Dishwashing the lids will cause hazing and cracking of the lids. 

***Lids don't seem to have a tight seal, some people find that removing the gasket, stretching it and reapplying it helps. We will not be refunding loose lids. We feel strongly that these awesome cups work perfectly without the tiny lid.
